title: 08/31/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/31/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Patriots' insider Tom Curran about the future of their QB position. Did he get indication that Cam Newton would be cut? Bailey Johnson, Prep Sports Reporter at the Columbus Dispatch, explains the controversy with high school football's Bishop Sycamore team. And Jeff Duncan of the New Orleans Times Picayune discusses where the Saints will call home for the next couple weeks because of the damage caused by Hurricane Ida.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
